curriculums.title: Artificial Intelligence Essentials
curriculums.description: Explore the basics of artificial intelligence, including machine learning and neural networks.
learningObjectives: Learn how machine learning algorithms work
Build and train simple neural networks

modules.title: Introduction to AI
modules.description: Learn the principles of artificial intelligence and its real-world applications.

modules.title: Machine Learning Basics
modules.description: Understand key concepts in machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning.

modules.title: Neural Networks 101
modules.description: Get started with building simple neural networks using Python.

curriculums.title: Game Development
curriculums.description: Learn the fundamentals of designing and developing games using modern engines.
learningObjectives: Learn to use game engines like Unity

modules.title: Game Mechanics and Dynamics
modules.description: Understand the core principles behind engaging gameplay.

modules.title: Unity Basics
modules.description: Learn the basics of game development with Unity.

modules.title: Scripting with C#
modules.description: Learn how to script interactive behaviors using C# in Unity.

curriculums.title: Cloud Computing
curriculums.description: Understand the principles of cloud computing and how to leverage it for scalable applications.
learningObjectives: Learn about cloud services (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS)

modules.title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
modules.description: Learn about cloud computing models and their advantages.

modules.title: AWS Basics
modules.description: Explore Amazon Web Services and its core features.

modules.title: Deploying Applications
modules.description: Learn how to deploy and manage applications on cloud platforms.

curriculums.title: DevOps Practices
curriculums.description: Learn how to implement DevOps practices to streamline software delivery.

modules.title: Introduction to DevOps
modules.description: Learn the principles and practices of DevOps.

modules.title: CI/CD Pipelines
modules.description: Implement continuous integration and continuous delivery pipelines.

modules.title: Monitoring and Logging
modules.description: Monitor and log application performance using industry tools.
